## Description

A clear and concise description of the proposed contract change.

## Change Type

- [ ] Breaking change (major version bump)
- [ ] Additive change (minor version bump)
- [ ] Documentation update (patch version bump)

## Contract File(s) Affected

- `api-contracts/openapi/v1/[domain].yaml`

## Proposed Changes

### Endpoints

- [ ] Add new endpoint
- [ ] Modify existing endpoint
- [ ] Remove endpoint

### Fields

- [ ] Add new field
- [ ] Modify existing field
- [ ] Remove field

### Other

- [ ] Change authentication requirements
- [ ] Change response codes
- [ ] Change error responses
- [ ] Documentation updates

## Detailed Changes

Describe the specific changes:

### Before
```yaml
# Current contract specification
```

### After
```yaml
# Proposed contract specification
```

## Impact Assessment

### Breaking Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] Removes endpoint
- [ ] Removes required field
- [ ] Changes field type
- [ ] Changes endpoint path/method
- [ ] Makes optional field required

### Migration Guide (if breaking)

- [ ] Migration guide created
- [ ] 30-day notice period planned
- [ ] Stakeholders notified

### FE Impact

- [ ] Requires frontend SDK changes
- [ ] Requires frontend API integration changes
- [ ] No frontend impact

## Version Bump

- Current version: `1.0.0`
- Proposed version: `[major.minor.patch]`
- Rationale: `[explain version bump]`

## Testing

- [ ] Contract passes local validation
- [ ] No breaking changes detected (or intentional)
- [ ] Examples updated
- [ ] Documentation updated

Add any other context, diagrams, or examples about the contract change.
